items.name: I Will Need Your Signature Pale Ale
items.desc:
The biggest dry hop we’ve lavished upon a pale ale EVER! Signature’s back and it’s fruitier, pinier & sweatier than ever before thanks to a quite frankly ridiculous amount of hops! 5.5% Mosaic adoration!

items.name: Lightbulb Extra Pale Ale
items.desc:
Lightbulb Extra Pale Ale.
As pale as a 100W light bulb but as juicy as an IPA. Session-able, quenching and totally addictive. Biscuity malt base with a hint of sweetness all drenched in fruity and dank hops.
We don't like our beer hanging around in a warehouse for the weekend so all orders placed after 12PM on Thursdays won't leave us until the following Monday.
For free Local delivery, if you would like your beers for the weekend, please place your order before 9AM Friday. A member of the team will be out delivering these orders on Thursdays & Fridays.
